articles.title: Shocking Real-Time Satellite Images Show Greenland’s Ice Sheet Melting at an Unprecedented Rate - The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
articles.description: A groundbreaking collaboration between two advanced satellite missions has delivered a clearer picture of what’s happening to Greenland’s vast ice sheet. With one satellite using radar and the other laser technology, scientists are documenting the ice loss wi…
articles.content: Greenlands vast ice sheet, a critical component of Earths climate system, is melting at a pace that has alarmed scientists and policymakers alike. The sheer scale of ice loss in recent years undersco… [+5410 chars]
